page.title: 11MEDIA IN LUTTERWORTH
page.content: Although 68% of teenagers like{ {videos}more than{T.V.}and{radio,}60% of teenagers prefer to go to the {cinema}rather than watch videos. T.V. is the most popular media form with the most popular channel being I.T.V. The most popular day for viewing T.V. is Saturday and the most popular programme at the moment is The Young Ones. The Young Ones is about 4 layabout youths who are very violent and aggressive. Other popular T.V. programmes with teenagers are the soap operas and Top of the Pops. On the radio most teenagers like the Steve Wright Show and their favourite station is Radio One. Steve Wright is a popular D.J. who impersonates people.
